CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( ShipmentDeliveredFml__c ) , IF( TODAY() > ExpectedDeliveryDateDte__c, TODAY() - ExpectedDeliveryDateDte__c, 0) , If( ShipmentDeliveredFml__c > ExpectedDeliveryDateDte__c, ShipmentDeliveredFml__c - ExpectedDeliveryDateDte__c, 0) )
CustomField.label: Dias atraso entrega
